# MusicPersonalRecommendation.Item

**Enumeration**

An item that represents an album, a playlist, or a station for a personal recommendation.

## Declaration

```swift
enum Item
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MusicPersonalRecommendation.Item.album(_:)**: An item that corresponds to an album.
- **MusicPersonalRecommendation.Item.playlist(_:)**: An item that corresponds to a playlist.
- **MusicPersonalRecommendation.Item.station(_:)**: An item that corresponds to a station.

## Instance Properties

- **artwork**: The artwork of this item.
- **id**: The unique identifier of this item.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle of this item.
- **title**: The title of this item.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Identifiable
- MusicItem
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
